name: A city where illusion and spectacle rule, built upon the layered remains of countless arenas.
one_line: Gleaming towers rise above deep subterranean vaults once used for ancient combat games. Illusory light dances through its skyline at night, masking the scars of old tournaments.
personality: Rendara was founded around the first stabilized arena core, expanding outward until its borders fused with the fractured dimensions that birthed it. Many citizens believe the city itself is alive— a sentient echo of past games, hungry for new champions.

name: Rendara’s colossal stadium where ten gateway platforms dispatch teams into pocket-dimension combats before a roaring crowd.
one_line: A bowl for hundreds of thousands, ringed by sky-tier galleries and private boxes. At the floor’s edge stand 10 raised platforms, each crowned by a rune-arched Gateway Doorway keyed to a separate combat instance. Above, a shimmering Spectator Veil projects live, multi-angle views from inside the instances onto panoramic air-screens.
physical: Grand, theatrical, precision-tuned—equal parts cathedral and engine room.
personality: Built atop the first stable arena core, The Arena’s gateways synchronize to shard-realms for regulated bouts. Early audiences watched via crystal relay mirrors; today the Veil stitches feeds into seamless, immersive panoramas.

name: A bustling middle-class quarter of Rendara filled with taverns, inns, markets, and homes.
one_line: Cobblestone streets weave between warm-lit shops, family-run taverns, and modest rowhouses with colorful awnings. Hanging lanterns sway between buildings, casting amber light even in daylight.
physical: Welcoming, industrious, proud of its self-made spirit.
personality: The Lantern District earned its name from the tradition of nightly lantern-lighting ceremonies said to honor the 'flickering hope' of the city’s workers and artisans. Many rising competitors and mages once lived here before fame took them elsewhere.

name: A warmly lit neighborhood tavern where locals swap stories, check arena odds, and unwind over hearty fare.
one_line: Polished wood bar, copper lanterns casting amber light, round tables near a crackling hearth. A discrete odds board updates bout lines; a small side counter handles legal wagers during operating hours.
physical: Welcoming, lively, fair-minded; prides itself on being community-first, not a gamblers’ den.
personality: Founded by retired arena medics who wanted a safe, friendly place for workers and competitors. The owners post responsible-wagering reminders and cut off betting when matches begin.
